entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this morning. Rain showers and flurries beginning this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023
